column1: 1594314841572999170,1594314841572999170@tedcruz Anything that Elon can give, unilaterally & on his whim today, he (or his successors) can take away tomorrow the same way. This is *temporary* benevolent tyranny - today. WHO amongst us can know what tomorrow may bring? A well-treated slave with a kind master is still a SLAVE! t_end
